column1: This is an example of adversarial text used for generating challenging and tricky inputs.
Adversarial examples are used to test the robustness of machine learning models.
Creating adversarial text samples involves generating inputs that are difficult for models to process.
Text generation models can be trained to produce adversarial examples to evaluate model performance.
This project focuses on fine-tuning GPT-2 for generating adversarial text samples.
